name: Jumping Time
description:
Jumping Time

A short jumping game with time theme

This game was made for the GameDev.tv Community Jam.

How to play

This game can be played with mouse only but for the pause menu you'll need to use the keyboard. Getting hit until the game over screen comes up is also an option though.

JUMP - Left mouse button
PAUSE - Escape key

Where can I find the source code?

You can go to the project on Github.

Additional Information

What was used to create this game?

  • Unity 2019
  • Blender
  • Bosca Ceoil
  • Bfxr
  • NavMeshComponents (Github of this Asset)
